name: places/ChIJw8hfRudYwokRqJzMNt3MEZE
formattedAddress: 35 Sutton Pl, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 35 Sutton Pl, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Patel is very kind, informative, and knowledgeable about the procedures she performs. I had a cyst on the back of my head, and she sat down and explained exactly what type of cyst it was and how the surgery would go. After the surgery, she waited until I woke up to explain that everything had gone well and how to take care of the stitches. A few days later, i remembered she had told me to contact her any time if I had any questions and to leave a voicemail if she didn't answer. When I left a voicemail, she called back within 30 minutes, ready to answer all the questions I had. Overall, I had a great experience and highly recommend her.

originalText.text:
My experience with Dr.Patel was an excellent one for starters she was very mindful and flexible with me i live in Nj she made sure my time was not taken for granted by not having me make unnecessary trips to her office she also was very theral explaining what to expect most important she accommodated my surgery to be first case so i can be home early.

The day of the surgery she was on time everything went as she had told me. Dr. Patel delivers what she says my recovery and healing processes was excellent she did a great job the incision healed super healthy no issues it doesn't look like something done that recent wich is good..

i am very pleased with her and her staff Neina her assistant very nice and professional she was always kind responsible following up on my messages related to questions for DR.Patel always made sure to follow up with me..

Over all the whole staff is great the Lady at the reception maybe related to DR.Patel was very welcoming and friendly never had to wait long to see DR.Patel even when i didn't make it on time for pre surgery paper work  i had to reschedule for the follow up time and Neina was able to assist kindly with no problem..

i only have great things to say about DR.patel's staff and facility very clean and organize by the way, the list can go on and on about how great she is and how comfortable and welcome anyone can feel i am happy and pleased with my procedure and experience i wish Dr.Patel, her staff and practice indefinite success...

originalText.text: Dr. Nima Patel is absolutely phenomenal.  I highly recommend her to anyone in need of excellent service and care With plastic surgery.  I recently had a breast reduction and She literally held my hand through my entire procedure.  She saved me from a lifetime of unwanted and unnecessary pain.  She gave me the pros and cons of my procedure.  She told me exactly what would happen and most importantly she was never Unavailable to talk to me.  I am forever grateful to Dr. Patel and her incredible staff!!  I’m actually trying to find another Reason to have more plastic surgery so she can continue to be my Dr.!!  Thank you Dr Patel for a wonderful experience ♥️.  You are honestly the best!

originalText.text:
Dr Patel is very professional and shes really good at what she does. I got a breast-reduction and she walked me through every steps, the good and the bad. She always responds asap to any questions no mater if its important or not, shes always there to answer any kind of questions. The surgery went very well and she did an amazing job
I highly recommend her to anyone who wants a breast reduction as your in good hands, not to mention she has very good bed side manners.i couldnt have found a better doctor to do the surgery for me. Thank you dr

originalText.text: I can’t thank enough for Dr Patel and her staff for helping me throughout the process of a mastectomy and reconstructive surgery. since  I met Dr Patel she explained all the pros and every available option for reconstruction, she took the time to listen to me on every appointment and was always on top of every detail. I’m so glad I had her on my side during the process. I very very much thankfully for her life and Moi (the secretary/ Assistante/ traductora) love them and for life gracefully. Muchas gracias Dr Patel for doing your job with love and so much cuidado.
